wiki.summary: Selena Gomez went from “Single Soon” to “Love On.” The singer released her first single of 2024, which strays far from the pre-breakup narrative of her last song. Instead, “Love On” captures the joy of flirting and finding new love. Lyrically, “Love On” captures the feeling of finding a great connection—and gets a little risqué in its flirty verses. Gomez’s song offers a further hint into her headspace and journey getting into the love story she is in now. Read more on Last.fm.
